leftMap.name: New York
leftMap.text: Where I learned to manage projects, talk to clients, drive a car, love Trader Joe's, and never trust the MTA

leftMap.name: Mitchell
leftMap.text: What better place to crash a car? There's a Corn Palace!

leftMap.name: Texas
leftMap.text: Texas is not the best place to have your AC break down

leftMap.name: Montreal
leftMap.text: Finally had some real poutine. Did not regret finish other peep's plates.

rightMap.name: Epitech
rightMap.text: Where I wrote my first lines of code and met my wife

rightMap.name: Kilix
rightMap.text: Where I sharpened my node.js skills, discovered wonderful people and worked on a beast of a project

rightMap.name: Meudon
rightMap.text: Where I grew up playing as many video games as the parents allowed it

rightMap.name: CDG
rightMap.text: Weird slow teleportation device to the US
